= Yr PHP library =
Yr_Service_Weatherdata fetches [WeatherdataXML] and makes the data available as PHP object properties.

The Yr PHP library requires [http://php.net PHP] 5.1 or newer, PHP 4 will *not* work.


Iterating over future weather
{{{
$yr = new Yr_Service_Weatherdata($iri);
foreach ($yr as $forecast) {
    // $forecast now corresponds to XML in /weatherdata/forecast/tabular/time/*
}
}}}
